page.title: 05SHOPPING IN DIDSBURY
page.content: Big city centres are trying to draw shoppers to their stores but smaller {local shops}are still very important to people. As parking a car becomes more difficult in crowded areas, people tend to visit shops they can walk or take a bus to for their{everyday {needs.}They are then known by local shopkeepers who are friendly and helpful. Many people visit the shops everyday especially older folks or those with pre-school age children.At local shops they often meet their friends. Here in Didsbury there is a good variety of shops,but many people feel that recently too many{building {societies}and{estate agents}have opened.People are divided about whether shops should open on a Sunday or not.At present most do not.
